Pre-Game Insights: Jeakson Singh is back in the national team after a six-month absence due to a shoulder injury.
Jeakson Singh has been a pivotal player for the Blue Tigers, featuring in 17 consecutive matches from the AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers in June 2022 until the King's Cup in Thailand in September 2023.
Jeakson Singh is excited to rejoin the national team for the FIFA World Cup Qualifiers against Afghanistan.
The Blue Tigers have had four full training sessions in Abha, Saudi Arabia, to acclimatize to the conditions ahead of the match on March 21.
Jeakson Singh reminisced about the last meeting with Afghanistan in 2022 at the Asian Cup Qualifiers in Kolkata, where India secured a dramatic victory.
